pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a powerful storm. This time-lapse video captures the dramatic formation and movement of a massive supercell thunderstorm. The dark, turbulent clouds swirl and churn rapidly across the sky as a heavy downpour falls from the base of the storm over the flat plains.
